title: add a member to kda
body: So with morgana and kayle being updated, I got to thinking about how kayle is in pentakill but morgana isn't really in any super note worthy skin themes. So why not put her in kda? It'd suit the dichotomy that morgana and kayle have going on and i think she'd fit right into kda.

replies.body: No, KDA Manager Taric is the one and only new skin that should be added
